meanings.definition: A person who punches back after being punched.
meanings.sent1: The counterpunchers in the boxing match showed great skill in retaliating.
meanings.sent2: The counterpunchers in the street fight quickly turned defense into offense.
meanings.sent3: The counterpunchers at the comedy club had the audience laughing with their witty comebacks.
meanings.sent4: In the world of debate, skilled counterpunchers can sway the audience with their rebuttals.
meanings.sent5: The counterpunchers in the video game always had a strategy to strike back effectively.

meanings.definition: The act of punching back in response to an attack.
meanings.sent1: During the argument, his counterpunchers surprised everyone with their impact.
meanings.sent2: The boxer's counterpunchers were swift and powerful, catching his opponent off guard.
meanings.sent3: The counterpunchers in the movie were so exaggerated, they made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her counterpunchers in the negotiation were like a shield, protecting her interests.
meanings.sent5: The counterpunchers in the self-defense class were taught to be quick and precise in their responses.
